Title: The Conjugal Bed
Writer: Goffredo Parise (idea), Rafael Azcona (story and screenplay), Marco Ferreri (story and screenplay), Diego Fabbri (scenario collaborator), Pasquale Festa Campanile (scenario collaborator), Massimo Franciosa (scenario collaborator)
Actors: Ugo Tognazzi, Marina Vlady, Walter Giller, Linda Sini
Plot: A 40 years old man, Alfonso, finally succeeds to marry a virgin, educate, beautiful and very catholic woman. But soon she, Regina, starts stressing him because she wants to be pregnant. When the stress is at its peak Regina at last gets pregnant. Once the goal is reached the man is put aside and dies.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.
